      RelationInterface¶

      An interface for relationship description objects.

      Builder¶

      Creates a new collection object for a type.

      « More »

      GenericCollection¶

      Represents a generic collection of entities.

      Data¶

      Represents a data set.

      « More »

      DataIterator¶

      An object to allow iteration over the elements of a Data object.

      Builder¶

      Creates a new entity object for a type.

      « More »

      GenericEntity¶

      Represents a single entity.

      « More »

      Exception¶

      A package-level exception.

      « More »

      Builder¶

      A builder for Lazy objects.

      « More »

      GenericLazy¶

      A generic Lazy object, useful in cases when special functionality is not needed.

      « More »

      Manager¶

      A manager for the types in the domain model.

      « More »

      AbstractRelation¶

      Represents a relationship definition between two types.

      « More »

      BelongsTo¶

      Represents a relationship where the native entity belongs to a foreign entity; the native entity is subordinate to the foreign one.

      « More »

      Builder¶

      A builder to create relationship definition objects.

      « More »

      HasMany¶

      Represents a relationship where a native entity has many foreign entities (i.e., a foreign collection); the foreign entities are subordinate to the native one.

      « More »

      HasManyThrough¶

      Represents a relationship where a native entity has many foreign entities (i.e., a foreign collection) mapped through an association type.

      « More »

      HasOne¶

      Represents a relationship where the native entity has one of the foreign entity; the foreign entity is subordinate to the native one.

      « More »

      Builder¶

      Builds a type object from an array of description information.

      « More »

      GenericType¶

      Describes a particular type within the domain, and retains an IdentityMap of entities for the type.
